column4: bah, still can't get this stupid printer to setup right. Ugh. think I'll have to either look at it tomorrow, or, (cough/hack/cough) use win2k for it again
there was an article that looked good on setting up a printer in ubuntu at freesoftwaremagazine...
not at that box right now.....and if I try to connect via http://IP_O'_the_box:631/, I get an error
http://www.freesoftwaremagazine.com/articles/printing_ubuntu might help with your printing....just has basic steps to setting up a printer
